title: The Secret Valley
narrative_story: The mountain stood eternal. From its peaks, monks would exit daily, walking down to beat the temple drums. They kept their practices secret. Some would enter the hidden paths to find internal peace. Others would holler their prayers to the sky. The teachings were divided into parts—some for the impoverished, others public knowledge. Pine trees lined the path to the valley below. There, disciples would bathe in cold streams. They sought to conquer desire, especially the lust that plagued young monks. The valley could contain multitudes. In time, all attachments would dissolve like morning mist.
narrative_arc: Monks in a mountain monastery seek to dissolve their desires through ritual bathing in a secret valley, where the divisions between public teaching and hidden wisdom blur
callbacks: Mountain connects to the Elements theme; Desire and dissolution foreshadow spiritual journey in later lessons

characters.mnemonic_image: Pictograph of three peaks forming a mountain
characters.story: The MOUNTAIN witnessed everything - mass graves in its shadows. I SING 'SHAHNNNN!' - sustained geological witness - stone remembers what we forget.
No one EXITS this place alive. I SING 'CHOOOO!' - sustained departure denial - the gates open only one way.

characters.meaning: To strike / To beat / To attack
characters.narrative_position: Walking down TO BEAT the temple drums
characters.story: They BEAT confessions from the innocent. I GASP 'JEE?!' - fists and sticks and truth beaten into lies.

characters.mnemonic_image: Roof + must + mountain = hidden under mountain, secret
characters.story: SECRETS are currency here. 'MEE!' information COMMANDS survival - what you know determines if you live.

characters.narrative_position: Some would ENTER the hidden paths
characters.story: Once you ENTER, there's no leaving. 'ROO!' the gate COMMANDS passage - one-way entry only.
INTERNAL thoughts are crimes here. 'NAY!' surveillance COMMANDS transparency - even thinking is public.
We HOLLER our loyalty to survive. 'NAH!' the crowd DEMANDS enthusiasm - silence is suspicion.

characters.narrative_position: The teachings were divided into PARTS
characters.mnemonic_image: Eight + knife = dividing into eight parts
characters.story: They DIVIDE families without mercy. I SING 'FENNNN!' - sustained separation - parts that will never rejoin.

characters.mnemonic_image: Divide + shell = divided from wealth, poor
characters.story: We are IMPOVERISHED by design. I GASP 'PEEN?!' - poverty as policy, hunger as control.
Everything is PUBLIC - no privacy exists. I SING 'GOHNGGG!' - sustained exposure - lives displayed like specimens.

characters.mnemonic_image: Tree + public = evergreen public tree, pine
characters.story: The PINE trees stand witness to our marches. I SING 'SOHNGGG!' - sustained green observers - trees outlive regimes.

characters.narrative_position: The path to the VALLEY below
characters.mnemonic_image: Opening + mouth = valley opening like mouth
characters.story: The VALLEY hides what the mountain shows. I GROAN 'Gooo...' - low hidden depths - secrets buried in geography.

characters.narrative_position: Disciples would BATHE in cold streams
characters.mnemonic_image: Water + valley = bathing in valley water
characters.story: We BATHE in ice water as punishment. 'YOO!' the guards COMMAND cleansing - hypothermia disguised as hygiene.

characters.mnemonic_image: Valley + lack = lacking in valley, desiring
characters.story: My only DESIRE is to survive another day. 'YOO!' hunger COMMANDS simple wants - desire reduced to basics.
Even LUST dies here - bodies too broken for desire. 'YOO!' exhaustion COMMANDS emptiness - passion starved away.

characters.mnemonic_image: Roof + valley = roof containing valley space
characters.story: The camp CONTAINS ten thousand. I GASP 'ROHNG?!' - multitudes compressed into too-small spaces.
Identity DISSOLVES in the collective. I GASP 'ROHNG?!' - self melting into mass - individuals becoming numbers.
